title: Unable to purchase champions.
body:
Hello everyone, 
  I have been having some trouble trying to purchase a champion, I have more than enough ip for the purchase but when I try it says 'purchase could not be completed at this time' which has been happening for over 12 hours now. When I go into the store and click on purchase said champion it says I have less ip then what it says in the top right at the main menu.

 If anyone could help me out by telling me whether it is a fault at my end or at Riots, I would really appreciate it.

replies.body:
Having the same issue for past 2 weeks, I was thinking its due to the upcoming season change?
any idea?
Im having the same problem here.
